Feb. 13, 1937 D South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (B Section)
South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (B Section) 20 Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association south-wales-monmouthshire-brass-band-association-b
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Town Hall, Pontypridd 4 bands competed.
Nov. 14, 2013, 11:43 a.m. Jan. 17, 2014, 1:57 p.m.
1 Cardiff Corporation Transport Harry Nuttall Robin Hood [Geehl]
2 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Terry Jenkins The Crusaders
3 Abercynon William Griffiths Faust [Berlioz, unknown arranger]
4 Blaengarw Tudor Jenkins Coriolanus
